Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

You [[/act perform dc=15 variant=dance]]{Perform (Performance)} / [[/act perform variant=dance dc=15 statistic=recitation]]{Perform (Recitation)} against a DC 15.On any outcome except a critical failure, all allies within your field can choose to Stride up to half their speed as a free action, or up to their speed on a critical success. They must end their movement within your field.
